Title: Relates to the approval of certain public authorities contracts by the state comptroller
Summary: Relates to the approval of certain public authorities' contracts by the state comptroller.
LawCode: Amd ยง2879-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the approval of certain public authorities contracts by the state comptroller
